parameters.name: containerRecipeArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the container recipe to retrieve.

nested_items.name: requestId
nested_items.description: The request ID that uniquely identifies this request.

nested_items.name: containerRecipe
nested_items.description: The container recipe object that is returned.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the container recipe.

nested_items.name: containerType
nested_items.description: Specifies the type of container, such as Docker.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the container recipe.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the container recipe.

nested_items.name: platform
nested_items.description: The system platform for the container, such as Windows or Linux.

nested_items.name: owner
nested_items.description: The owner of the container recipe.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The semantic version of the container recipe.

nested_items.name: components
nested_items.description: Build and test components that are included in the container recipe. Recipes require a minimum of one build component, and can have a maximum of 20 build and test components in any combination.

nested_items.name: componentArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the component.

nested_items.name: parameters
nested_items.description: A group of parameter settings that Image Builder uses to configure the component for a specific recipe.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the component parameter to set.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: Sets the value for the named component parameter.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: instanceConfiguration
nested_items.description: A group of options that can be used to configure an instance for building and testing container images.

nested_items.name: image
nested_items.description: The base image for a container build and test instance. This can contain an AMI ID or it can specify an Amazon Web Services Systems Manager (SSM) Parameter Store Parameter, prefixed by ssm:, followed by the parameter name or ARN.

nested_items.name: blockDeviceMappings
nested_items.description: Defines the block devices to attach for building an instance from this Image Builder AMI.

nested_items.name: deviceName
nested_items.description: The device to which these mappings apply.

nested_items.name: encrypted
nested_items.description: Use to configure device encryption.

nested_items.name: deleteOnTermination
nested_items.description: Use to configure delete on termination of the associated device.

nested_items.name: iops
nested_items.description: Use to configure device IOPS.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: Use to configure the KMS key to use when encrypting the device.

nested_items.name: snapshotId
nested_items.description: The snapshot that defines the device contents.

nested_items.name: volumeSize
nested_items.description: Use to override the device's volume size.

nested_items.name: volumeType
nested_items.description: Use to override the device's volume type.

nested_items.name: throughput
nested_items.description: For GP3 volumes only --- The throughput in MiB/s that the volume supports.

nested_items.name: virtualName
nested_items.description: Use to manage instance ephemeral devices.

nested_items.name: noDevice
nested_items.description: Use to remove a mapping from the base image.

nested_items.name: dockerfileTemplateData
nested_items.description: Dockerfiles are text documents that are used to build Docker containers, and ensure that they contain all of the elements required by the application running inside. The template data consists of contextual variables where Image Builder places build information or scripts, based on your container image recipe.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: Identifies which KMS key is used to encrypt the container image for distribution to the target Region.

nested_items.name: encrypted
nested_items.description: A flag that indicates if the target container is encrypted.

nested_items.name: parentImage
nested_items.description: The base image for customizations specified in the container recipe. This can contain an Image Builder image resource ARN or a container image URI, for example amazonlinux:latest.

nested_items.name: dateCreated
nested_items.description: The date when this container recipe was created.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: workingDirectory
nested_items.description: The working directory for use during build and test workflows.

nested_items.name: targetRepository
nested_items.description: The destination repository for the container image.

nested_items.name: service
nested_items.description: Specifies the service in which this image was registered.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the container repository where the output container image is stored. This name is prefixed by the repository location. For example, <repository location url>/repository_name.
